hero.title: AI & Data Specialist
hero.description: I am a data professional with expertise in machine learning and data analysis. Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence at the University of Auckland, I combine strong mathematical foundations with practical experience in data analytics and machine learning implementation.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: AI & Data Specialist
about.p1: I am Jinyuan Kang, a data professional currently pursuing a Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence at the University of Auckland. With a Bachelor's in Mathematics and Computer Science, I combine strong theoretical foundations with practical implementation skills.
about.p2: In my professional journey, I've focused on data analysis and machine learning, developing various AI projects and data-driven solutions. I am proficient in Python, SQL, and various machine learning frameworks including PyTorch, TensorFlow, and Transformers.
about.p3: I am passionate about artificial intelligence and data science, with particular interest in developing innovative solutions that generate actionable insights. Currently, I am seeking opportunities in AI and data analytics where I can leverage my technical expertise while continually expanding my knowledge and skills.
about.techstack.desc: Proficient in Python, Machine Learning frameworks, and various data analysis tools
about.education.desc: Master of Artificial Intelligence & Bachelor of Science in Math and Computer Science from University of Auckland
about.projects.desc: Developed multiple AI/ML projects, including sentiment analysis models and intelligent recommendation systems

job1.desc1: Deliver courses to students, adapting teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students' varying needs and interests.
job1.desc2: Maintain regular communications with students, addressing concerns and answering questions to improve their academic performance.
job1.desc3: Keep detailed records of goals, activities, and results of each lesson to track student progress and provide a basis for future lesson planning.
job1.desc4: Develop customized learning plans based on individual student needs and learning styles.
job1.desc5: Provide specialized instruction in mathematics and computer science topics including data structures, algorithms, and programming concepts.

job2.desc1: Conducted in-depth research of stock/futures upstream and downstream products, identifying key drivers and analyzing performance trends.
job2.desc2: Utilized linear regression to quantify relationships between market variables and predict future trends.
job2.desc3: Implemented Python and SQL solutions to streamline data processing, significantly reducing operational costs.
job2.desc4: Employed BI tools to uncover market trends and support informed strategic decisions.
job2.desc5: Generated comprehensive reports summarizing key findings and delivered clear, actionable insights to stakeholders.

education.title: Education Background
education.bachelor: Bachelor of Science (Math and Computer Science)
education.desc1: Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence at the University of Auckland, focusing on advanced machine learning techniques, neural networks, and intelligent systems.
education.desc2: Completed a Bachelor's degree in Science with double major in Mathematics and Computer Science at the University of Auckland, studying fundamental theories and practical skills in computational mathematics and algorithms.
education.achievement1: Course Planning and Recommendation System: Led development of an end-to-end recommendation system with 40% higher efficiency
education.achievement2: Sentiment Analysis of Restaurant Reviews: Developed multi-label classification model with 81% accuracy for Chinese restaurant reviews

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Have a question or want to work together? Feel free to get in touch!
